_header: O Jesu mercy what world is this
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; despair; seven deadly sins

BodTan407.First Lines:
O ihesu mercy what world is thysfrendys be feer and feynte at
                    nede…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…therfor lete it passe and be not sadAnd thynk vpon hym
                    þat alle amende may
